summary: makes vampires and their thralls allies when you are a stage 4 vampire
descriptionHtml:
DON\'T USE THIS WITH DAWNGUARD 
the story of it contradicts this mod
-----------------------------------------------------------
it took me less than 5 mins to make.

random notes:
-the armor my PC is wearing is not included
-the screenshot was taken in Movarth\'s Lair (before doing the mission)
-this only affects vampires (not draugr, spiders, skeevers, etc.) so don\'t expect to walk into every vampire hideout and expect a totally warm welcome.  it would be a little OP imo if you could walk into every dungeon and not have to fight a thing.
-if you are not a stage 4 vampire, the npc vamps will attack you like normal
author: Stonedhippos
